channel.title: Need 508 help on coding please look
channel.description: [b]Ok im starting on a 508 and i need help im new with 508's and not a very good coder with 508's jew to spending my time making the old ones so, first off all noobish question i no but how do you get specs on like dds whip godswords, most wepons including range this will be realli great help with my server ((client)) also if you can tell me how to get emot's on skillcapes. plus how to add somet like 70% mage mostly ancients would be great if you helped with lunar i no this is alot to ask but i hope a exsperinced coder would help me and i would gladly give most credit to them. the clients what i have amiard the most is the client JC-SCAPE that is mostly it. But if someone could help me i would be very pleased and if they were ever to joing my client would gladly make them co-owner ONE THING that was not black-mail that would be to show my aprecation for the help. a great thanks for looking. [/b]

item.title: Need 508 help on coding please look
item.dc:creator: @firecapescapee firecapescapee
item.description:
@firecapescapee wrote:

Ok im starting on a 508 and i need help im new with 508’s and not a very good coder with 508’s jew to spending my time making the old ones so,
first off all noobish question i no but how do you get specs on like dds whip godswords,
most wepons including range this will be realli great help with my server ((client))
also if you can tell me how to get emot’s on skillcapes.
plus how to add somet like 70% mage mostly ancients would be great if you helped with lunar
i no this is alot to ask but i hope a exsperinced coder would help me and i would gladly give most credit to them.
the clients what i have amiard the most is the client JC-SCAPE
that is mostly it.
But if someone could help me i would be very pleased and if they were ever to joing my client would gladly make them co-owner ONE THING that was not black-mail that would
be to show my aprecation for the help. a great thanks for looking.
